amendment.description: An amendment numbered 30 printed in Part B of House Report 116-32 to give college campuses the opportunity to offer primary prevention training, in addition to survivor support services.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rouda amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Rouda.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rouda amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.
